dt: {bc}an act, operation, or instance of {a_link|subtracting}: such as
{bc}the withdrawing or withholding of a right to which an individual is entitled
{bc}the operation of deducting one number from another

et: Middle English {it}subtraccion{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}sustraction, subtraction{/it}, from Late Latin {it}subtraction-, subtractio{/it}, from Latin {it}subtrahere{/it}
shortdef: an act, operation, or instance of subtracting: such as
the withdrawing or withholding of a right to which an individual is entitled
the operation of deducting one number from another
